altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: Takane-san to Arashi-chan

description.en: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
description.pl: W obliczu dnia zagłady, Ling Mo przebudził wewnątrz siebie specjalną moc. Odkrył on, że może kontrolować zombie. Dlatego mógł bezpiecznie przejść przez tłum zombie i przeżyć, a ostatecznie spotkał swoją ukochaną dziewczynę - Ye Lian, ale tylko by dowiedzieć się, że została już przekształcona w zombie. Aby pomóc Ye odzyskać swoje wspomnienia, Ling Mo rozpoczął swoje przetrwanie podczas apokalipsy.
description.es-la: Ante el día del juicio final, el poder especial dentro de Ling Mo fue despertado. Él se percató que podía controlar a los zombis. Debido a su poder, podía caminar sano y salvo a través de la multitud de zombis, y eventualmente se reunió con su amada novia, Ye Lian, pero solo para descubrir que ella ya se había transformado en un zombi. Para ayudarla a recuperar sus recuerdos, Ling Mo comenzó su supervivencia en el día del juicio final.
description.pt-br: Diante do apocalypse, o poder especial dentro de Ling Mo foi despertado. Ele descobriu que podia controlar os zumbis. Por causa de seu poder, Ele podia caminhar em segurança através de hordas de zumbis, e, eventualmente, ele se reencontrou com sua amada namorada – Ye Lian, Apenas para descobrir que ela já havia se transformado em um zumbi. Para ajudá-la a recuperar suas memórias, Ling Mo embarca em uma jornada para sobreviver no apocalypse.

altTitles.ja: 男塾外伝 赤石剛次

altTitles.ja-ro: Yumekui Merry

altTitles.th: เมอรี่ นักล่าฝันร้าย

altTitles.ja: 夢喰いメリー

altTitles.ja-ro: Yume Kui Merry

description.en: Yumeji has the power to forecast a person's dream based on the multicolored auras that surround them when he looks through his fingers. His skills are unpolished, but when he sees a black aura, he knows for certain what that person will see that night, a nightmare. Yumeji has been having nightmares himself recently, where he is chased endlessly by an army of cats until he awakens. But when a strange girl named Merry literally falls into his life, his experience with dreams becomes bizarre and dangerous when he vows to help Merry return to the world of dreams from whence she came.
description.it: Fujiwara Yumeji è uno studente delle superiori con lo strano potere di capire i sogni che una persona avrà in base al colore della sua aura. Il ragazzo fa spesso l’incubo di lottare contro i gatti e non sa ancora di essere il portale che unisce il mondo dei sogni a quello reale. Un giorno, di ritorno da una libreria, incontra Merry, una ragazza un po’ particolare proveniente dal mondo dei sogni ma bloccata in quello umano. Da quell’istante la sua vita cambia e insieme a Merry si trova coinvolto in una dura lotta contro i gatti che vogliono impadronirsi del suo corpo per portare avanti i loro loschi scopi: invadere il mondo reale.
description.pt: Yumeji Fujiwara, um jovem estudante como qualquer outro, obteve o poder de ver a aura dos sonhos de outras pessoas, e é capaz de prever que tipo de sonho terão na noite seguinte, graças a um evento que ocorreu há 10 anos. Desde então, começou a ter sonhos estranhos com gatos que o seguiam por uma razão desconhecida, e é aí que descobre, graças ao chefe do exército dos gatos, John Doe, que seu corpo é necessário para acessar o mundo real. Certo Dia, quando estava a ponto de voltar para casa depois de seus deveres, uma misteriosa garota cai em cima dele. Ela, chamada Merry Nightmare, é na realidade um demônio dos sonhos, que está buscando uma maneira de voltar ao seu mundo. Yumeji decide ajudá-la a voltar, a porta ao mundo dos sonhos se abre de novo, mas desta vez em plena luz do dia…

title.en: Ouritsu Majutsu Gakuin No Kichiku Koushi

altTitles.ja: 王立魔術学院の鬼畜講師

altTitles.en: Demon Instructor at the Royal Academy of Magic

altTitles.vi: Giảng Viên Ác Quỷ Tại Học Viện Hoàng Gia

description.en:
Setsuna is a perverted instructor who is unable to invoke magic. As a part-time Instructor at the Royal Academy of Magic, he continually tells his students to self-study. The new students who entered the academy with high expectations are disappointed in Setsuna, and judging him to be incompetent, they challenge him to a Geas duel.

《Will you resign if I win?》
《“I”? Surely you mean “we”… All of you have been pretty annoying, so I want you all to take me on. But in return, you know what will happen if you lose, right?》

Setsuna plays with the special students, who are the best in a hundred years, with perverse and astonishing magic that is unthinkable in common sense! But behind the demon-like behavior, could there be a true purpose…?
___
**Character Designer:** [zunta](https://mangadex.org/author/844f9d85-2b7f-46fe-a69d-5c3e84cc2142/zunta)
description.ja: この世のすべての変態性を受け継いだかのような男の『指導』が今、始まる！
description.pt-br:
Setsuna é um instrutor pervertido que não consegue invocar magia. 
Como professor de meio período na Royal Academy of Magic, ele continuamente diz a seus alunos para estudarem sozinhos.
Os novos alunos que entraram na academia com grandes expectativas ficam desapontados com Setsuna e, julgando-o incompetente, desafiam-no para um duelo de Geass.

- Você vai renunciar de seu cargo se eu ganhar?
- "EU"? Certamente você quer dizer "nós". Todos vocês têm sido muito irritantes, então quero que todos vocês me enfrentem. Mas, em troca, você sabe o que acontecerá se perder, certo?

Setsuna brinca com os alunos especiais, que são os melhores em cem anos, com uma magia perversa e surpreendente que é impensável no senso comum!
Mas por trás do comportamento demoníaco, poderia haver um verdadeiro propósito...?

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
"You're amazing for being alive another day!"

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a "log-in bonus" every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

altTitles.ja: となりの黒川さん
My Neighbor Ms.Kurokawa

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret. 

This awkward duo weaves a sweet and tangy youth romantic comedy that will make you grin!
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼
description.vi: Bí mật giữa mình và cậu ấy tuy bình thường nhưng quan trọng!Hajime Takahashi nhập học tại trường cao trung Shuubi chỉ vì nơi đó là thánh địa trong bộ truyện tranh cậu yêu thích. Tất cả mọi ngóc ngách của trường đều được phác họa trong bộ truyện, điều đó khiến cậu phấn khích tột cùng! Giữa không khí hào hứng, Takahashi gặp một cô gái xinh đẹp giống hệt nữ chính trong tác phẩm yêu thích của mình, Yayoi Kurokawa, và họ đã sẻ chia bí mật của bản thân với nhau.

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

description.en:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world!  

――This is a light for life in a different world.  When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf…?!  
  
Start different world capture with different races and sub-races!  

---

- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)
description.es:
Supervivencia en el otro mundo con mi maestro  
¿¡Kousuke se encontró en un mundo completamente diferente!?  
De pie allí, con el desierto al este y un bosque a su izquierda, decidió hacer un buen uso de la ocurrencia y pone a prueba su conocimiento, donde encuentra esta increíble habilidad de creación, ¡al igual que los juegos de su mundo original!
description.ja:
気が付けば、そこは異世界だった!?目の前には荒野と背後には森が広がる大地に立っていたコースケ。

培った知識から森でサバイバルをしていたところ、元の世界でプレイしていたサバイバルゲームのように道具を作れるクラフト能力を手に入れていたことに気が付いた。

——これで異世界生活にも光明が。と思っていたところ、いきなり美人ダークエルフに襲われて……!?

異種族・亜人種たちとゆく異世界攻略スタート!!

---

- [Official LN (JP)](https://gcnovels.jp/goshujin/)  
- [Original WN (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3742ey/)
description.ru: Косукэ оказался в совершенно ином мире. Стоя там посреди дикой природы в густом лесу, он решил использовать это перемещение с умом и проверить свои знания выживания! Там он находит эту удивительную возможность крафта, точно такую же, как и в игре из его изначального мира!

altTitles.ja: バーフウラーズ

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!

altTitles.ja: 月紅

description.en: Kyotaro is just an ordinary guy trying to lead an ordinary high school life, despite the fact that he is the son of a yakuza boss. Then comes Kumiko, his half-sister he's never met before, who's looking for a man with a centipede tattoo who killed her loved ones in the past. Will Kumiko and Kyotaro be able to manage their family business? Will Kumiko ever find and take revenge on the man with the centipede tattoo? And will they be able to control their sexual urges for each other?

title.en: Mizu Mahou Gurai Shika Torie ga Nai Kedo Gendai Chishiki ga Areba Juubun da yo ne?

altTitles.ja: 水魔法ぐらいしか取り柄がないけど現代知識があれば充分だよね？

altTitles.ja-ro: Suimahō gurai shika torie ga nai kedo gendai chishiki ga areba jūbun da yo ne?

altTitles.en: Although the Only Good Thing About Her Is Water Magic, Modern Knowledge Is Enough, Right?

description.en:
A five-year-old orphan named Frim, struggling to survive on the streets of the slums, recalls memories of Her past life as a Japanese person. Her everyday life is filled with violence and injustice, and She has no allies. All She possesses are "magic that can produce water" and "modern knowledge." Even finding a place with a roof to sleep under is a luxury in her current situation...

However, by using ideas that don’t exist in this world to improve his working conditions and discovering new ways to utilize water magic beyond drinking water, Frim gradually begins to make her presence known!

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou no Taida na Tameiki

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の怠惰な溜め息

altTitles.en: Lazy Sigh of the Villainous Daughter

description.en:
I was reincarnated as a villainess from an otome game I was playing. At this rate, I'll be exiled for being in the heroine’s way of conquering love. However, in this world… there are no entertainment materials! No doujinshis, no otome games, no smartphone! I'm really bored! Of course, I should be avoiding the destructive bad end… but before that I’m going to die from boredom!  
  
"If there's no entertainment, just create it!"  
  
Using the knowledge from my past life to create toys and romance novels, I'll make this boring world fun! After becoming the queen’s favorite entrepreneur, I thought this scenario change will bring me to my wonderful future… But now the novel I wrote has brought me to the destruction flag–?!  


---
description.es:
Me reencarné como una villana de un juego inaugural que estaba jugando.  
Pero en cualquier lugar del mundo … ¡el entretenimiento es demasiado! ¡Sin doujinshi, sin juego inaugural, sin teléfono inteligente! ¡Soy realmente libre!  
Por supuesto, debes evitar la ruta de la ruina … ¡pero antes de eso te aburrirás y morirás!  
"Si no tienes entretenimiento, ¡solo hazlo!"  
Aprovechando el conocimiento de la vida anterior para crear juguetes y novelas románticas, ¡convierte el aburrido mundo en color de rosa!  
¡La bandera de la ruina vino debido a una novela que pensé y escribí!
description.ja:
プレイ中だった乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生したアラサーの私。だけどこの世界……娯楽がなさすぎる！　同人誌も乙女ゲームもスマホもない！　すっごく暇！もちろん破滅ルートは避けないといけないけれど……その前に退屈で死んじゃう！

「娯楽がなければ作ればいいのよ！」

前世の知識を活かして玩具や恋愛小説を生み出し、退屈な世界をバラ色にしてみせる！王妃様お気に入りの実業家になり、これでシナリオを外れて素敵な未来が……と思いきや、書いた小説のせいで破滅フラグがやってきた――!?

altTitles.en: Pregnant Wife And The Little Ones

description.en:
He has the absolute power. He kills without hesitation and is a cold, fickle man. Yet he becomes obsessed with her and dotes on her nonstop.  
  
The first time they met, he asked, “Was it you, six years ago?”  
  
The second time they met, he’s holding onto the DNA test, “You still dare to say he’s not my son?”  
  
The n time they met, “Mr. Duke, do you have an end to this?”  
The guy smiled with a deep charm, “The second child have yet to be born. Of course, there’s no end to this.”

altTitles.en: I Can't Tell Which Twin is Which Sex

altTitles.ja: 双子の男女がわからない

altTitles.es-la: No sé qué Gemelo es de qué Sexo

altTitles.es: No sé qué Gemelo es de qué Sexo

altTitles.es: No sé Cuál de los Gemelos es una Chica

description.en: Takushi Hatsujou had played with a twin brother and sister when they were all kids, and he fell in love with the sister, culminating in his asking for her hand in marriage when they grew up, to which she agreed. However, they were torn apart for 10 years until Takushi is finally able to get his grandfather's permission to marry her. When they finally reunite, he is surprised to find they both look like girls. Although he knows one of them is cross-dressing, he can't tell which is a guy and which is a girl.
description.es: Takushi Hatsujou había jugado con un hermano y una hermana gemelos cuando eran niños, y se enamoró de la hermana, lo que culminó en que le pidiera matrimonio cuando crecieran, a lo que ella accedió. Sin embargo, estuvieron separados durante 10 años, hasta que Takushi consiguió por fin el permiso de su abuelo para casarse con ella. Cuando por fin se reúnen, él se sorprende al ver que ambos parecen niñas. Aunque sabe que uno de ellos está travestido, no puede distinguir cuál es un chico y cuál una chica.
description.vi: Takushi Hatsujou đã chơi với một cặp sinh đôi khi họ còn nhỏ, và cậu ấy đã yêu một người trong số họ, thậm chí còn ngỏ lời cầu hôn và cô ấy đã đồng ý. Tuy nhiên, họ đã bị chia cắt suốt 10 năm cho đến khi Takushi được ông nội cho phép cưới cô. Khi họ đoàn tụ, cậu ấy ngạc nhiên khi thấy cả hai đều trông giống con gái. Dù biết một trong số họ đang trap nhưng cậuh ấy không thể phân biệt được đâu là nam, đâu là nữ.
description.es-la: Takushi Hatsujou había jugado con un hermano y una hermana gemelos cuando eran niños, y se enamoró de la hermana, lo que culminó en que le pidiera matrimonio cuando crecieran, a lo que ella accedió. Sin embargo, estuvieron separados durante 10 años, hasta que Takushi consiguió por fin el permiso de su abuelo para casarse con ella. Cuando por fin se reúnen, él se sorprende al ver que ambos parecen niñas. Aunque sabe que uno de ellos está travestido, no puede distinguir cuál es un chico y cuál una chica.

altTitles.ja: アライブ

description.en:
Hondo Akira was shot to death by the U.S. military for a crime he did not commit. However, he somehow survived and became a teacher at a girls’ high school. 

The objective of his assignment to this school? The key to that is in the hands of Tsukishima Hibiki, an ordinary high school girl in the art club… 

The story accelerates as Hondo, an out-of-the-ordinary egoistic gentleman, gets involved in his surroundings.
description.ja:
無実の罪を着せられ、米軍に射殺されたはずの男・本堂 明。しかし彼は生き永らえ女子高の教師となっていた。

彼がこの学校に赴任した目的とは？その鍵は美術部の普通の女子高生 月島 響が握っている―？

紳士なようで唯我独尊、規格外の男・本堂が周囲を巻き込み物語は加速していく。

altTitles.en: I Am a Daughter Loved by the Devil
I Am the Beloved Daughter of the Devil

altTitles.pt-br: Sou a amada filha do diabo

description.en:
I'm Mia, a child abused by my family. One day I had a 'dream' and saw the future. A future where I fell for my aunt and uncle's schemes, accidentally murdered my older half-brother, and causing a great war. Things just can't end like this, so I'll change the future with my own hands! 

With the information gathered from the dream, the first thing I have to do is find my biological father!

"Gimme thild thupport!"

(If only I didn't lisp!) In return for selling information about my uncle's schemes and taking all the backlog of child support from my biological father, I was planning on leaving…

But then my eldest brother, who boasts an aloof beauty, said, "I'm thinking of building you an amusement park."

My reckless second eldest brother interrupted and said, "Shall I buy you a tropical island covered with pretty flowers?"

And the most handsome man in the world, my Papa, replied on a whole nother level! "I'll buy you an artifact which calls for mermaids."

No, no, no! All three have terrible liquidity! The cleverest, smartest, most materialistic, devilish answer is… "Please make me a slide made of pure gold!"

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.ko:
"양유삐 주세요!(양육비 주세요!)"

외숙부와 이모에게 학대를 받으며 살던 미아. 어느 날, 그녀는 꿈 속에서 자신이 외숙부의 계략에 넘어가 친오빠를 살해하고, 세계 멸망을 일으키는 미래를 보게 된다.

이렇게 죽을 수는 없지! 미래는 내 손으로 바꾼다!

미아는 친부에게 외숙부의 흉계를 팔아 넘기고, 밀린 양육비에 정보 비용을 얹어서 청구하기로 결심하는데...

나는 제법 심각한 표정을 지으며 입을 열었다. 양손도 자랑스레 펼쳐 보인 채였다.

"샤다 샤. 그삐 정보에 단됸 천 골드! (싸다 싸. 극비 정보에 단돈 천 골드!)"

저기, 세계 멸망을 막을 정보 사실래요?

_

"꽃이 예쁘게 피는 열대 섬 하나 사줄까?"
아벨이 이렇게 말하자마자,

"섬에 아무것도 없으면 심심할테니 큰 오빠가 놀이동산을 하나 지어줄까 해."
카이옌 오빠가 끼어들고,

"나는 인어를 부르는 아티팩트를 사주마. 그게 있으면 밤새 인어의 노래를 들으며 놀 수 있을 거다."
아빠는 한 술 더 뜬다!

나는 영리하고 똑똑한 속물 악마답게 공손히 입을 열었다.

"미끄럼틀은 순금으로 만들어 주세요."

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.pt-br:
Mia cresceu sendo abusada por seu tio e tia. Um dia, em um sonho, ela vê um futuro que cai no esquema de seu tio e tia maternos, mata seu meio-irmão e causa uma grande guerra. Não pode acabar assim, o futuro está em minhas mãos! O primeiro passo nesse esforço é encontrar o pai que você conheceu em seu sonho!

“Dê-me uma carona!”

Em troca de vender as artimanhas do meu tio materno para o meu pai biológico, eu planejava sair com a pensão alimentícia e os custos de informação...
“Estou pensando em construir um parque de diversões.”

Quando o irmão mais velho, que se orgulha de nobre beleza, disse: “Você gostaria de me comprar uma ilha tropical com lindas flores?”

Meu segundo irmão não vai intervir, "Eu vou te comprar um artefato que chama uma sereia."

O pai mais bonito do mundo tem mais uma bebida! não! Todos os três são extremamente ruins para o dinheiro!!! A resposta diabólica do esnobe esperto e esperto é... “Faça o slide de ouro puro!”

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)

I was transported into the romantic fantasy novel my younger sister was reading, not as the male lead but as the second male lead. If I remember correctly, this punk is fated to go into war in the future and die in the male lead’s place. Okay, I’ve made up my mind. Let’s not go anywhere near the main characters and stay healthy until I can go home.

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en: Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games. Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them. As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...! But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected...
description.ja: 子供のころ、小太郎は地元のいじめっ子によって屈辱の日々を送っていた。レスリングの天才少年・アキラ、バスケの天才少年・カナエ、天才ゲーマー少年・シグレにあらゆる勝負で負け続けていたのだった高校生となった小太郎は、仕返しするべく３人と再会したのであったが…！？
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill o Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

altTitles.es: Cada vez que me Expulsaban, Adquiría una Nueva Habilidad y Después de 100 Mundos Diferentes, Ya no Tengo Rival

altTitles.zh-hk: 每遭放逐就能獲得技能的我，在100個世界大開第二輪無雙

altTitles.zh: 每遭放逐就能获得技能的我，在100个世界大开第二轮无双

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.pt-br: Ganhei uma Nova Habilidade Toda Vez que Fui Exilado, e Após 100 Mundos Diferentes, Me tornei Imbativel

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
description.pt-br:
Um aventureiro chamado Ed foi expulso de sua equipe porque era considerado inútil, mas em vez de ficar triste e chateado, ele ficou feliz!!?

Acontece que não é sem razão que ele se sente feliz quando é expulso de uma equipe, porque toda vez que isso acontece, ele recebe uma habilidade que o torna ainda mais invencível...

Ed recebeu um teste maluco: ele teria que ser expulso de 100 equipes de Heróis em 100 mundos diferentes antes de poder voltar ao seu mundo original. Finalmente, uma entidade misteriosa e divina disse que ele havia cumprido todas as condições para retornar ao seu mundo original.

No entanto, como condição final, ele é desafiado: "Olhe o destino de um desses mundos de exílio depois que você partiu." E ele fica chocado com o que vê.

"Ok, eu vou fazer isso! Vou voltar para esses 100 mundos e ser banido com uma boa sensação!"

Ed assume um novo desafio: fazer pleno uso das superpoderosas "Habilidades de Exílio" que foram concedidas a cada vez que foi expulso, e desta vez garantir que todos tenham finais felizes.

title.en: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai

altTitles.ja: 町人Aは悪役令嬢をどうしても救いたい～どぶと空と氷の姫君～

altTitles.en: Villager A Wants to Save the Villainess no Matter What!

altTitles.ru: Крестьянин хочет спасти злодейку любой ценой!

altTitles.vi: Dù là phản diện những tôi vẫn muốn giúp cô ấy

altTitles.id: Penduduk Desa A Ingin Menyelamatkan Tokoh Antagonis Apapun yang Terjadi!

description.en:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn’t do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! 

With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother’s life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isn’t even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!
description.ja: モブ以下"町人A"、家族のために悪役令嬢を救う⁉ 乙女ゲーム世界にモブ以下の存在として転生したアレン。記憶を取り戻し、数年後にヒロインのせいで街ごと蹂躙され、自分も家族も滅んでしまう!と気づき一念発起。前世のゲーム知識(チート)を駆使して成り上がることに。どぶさらいなど地道な努力とチートの結果Cランク冒険者となり、いよいよ学園入学――本来ならば学園に入ることも許されない町人Aに悪役令嬢は救えるのか?ヒロイン対町人Aの戦いがスタート!第2回アース・スターノベル大賞、佳作受賞作待望の書籍化
description.ru:
Аллен, восьмилетний мальчик из бедной семьи в королевской столице, живет бедной, но счастливой жизнью вместе со своей матерью. Однако однажды к нему внезапно возвращаются воспоминания о его прошлой жизни, и он вспоминает, что находится в симуляторе свиданий и что столица будет разрушена войной, если он ничего с этим не сделает.

Если так будет продолжаться, и он, и его мать будут убиты!

С чувством срочности он решает воспользоваться случаем, чтобы спасти жизнь своей драгоценной матери и спасти своего любимого персонажа, злодейскую юную леди Анастасию, единственную девушку, которая ему нравилась в игре, от ее слишком трагического и разрушительного конца.

Это история человека, который даже не является персонажем игры, но который борется со своей стальной решимостью и использует все имеющиеся у него знания, чтобы повернуть судьбу вспять!
description.vi:
Allen, 8 tuổi, sống trong một hoàn cảnh nghèo khó nhưng hạnh phúc với mẹ của mình. Một hôm nọ, ký ức tiền kiếp quay về. Thế giới này thực ra là một game giả lập hẹn hò và nơi cậu sống sẽ bị hủy diệt nếu như cậu không làm gì đó

Thế nên cậu quyết định giúp đỡ nữ phản diện trong game để cứu lấy cô khỏi kết thảm và cũng để cứu mẹ của mình

Đây là một câu chuyện về một nhân vật thậm chí chẳng tồn tại trong game, trên con đường lật kèo bằng ý chí và kiến thức của mình!

Aizawa is a total loser fujoshi OL (Office Lady) One day the artist she worshipped as a god, Misumi— announced she was going to a doujinshi event, so she headed to the venue. But sitting in the artist's booth was a cute high-school girl! (Ref. Amazon)

お隣遊び

After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.pt-br: A História de como Uma Linda Estudante Estrangeira que Mora ao Lado Começou a Visitar Minha Casa Depois que Ajudei Uma Menininha Perdida

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.es: La situación de los vampiros en la casa de Hiiragi

altTitles.ja: 柊さんちの吸血事情

altTitles.es-la: Todos los días con una familia de vampiros
Las circunstancias de beber sangre de la familia Hiiragi

description.en: Every family has its own "secrets"... Shota Minamoto, a junior high school student, lives in an orphanage. One day, he is taken in by a family who lives in a gorgeous Japanese style mansion. Shota is welcomed with open arms, but the family has a secret that must not be revealed to the world.
description.ru:
У каждой семьи есть "секрет".
Минамото Сёта - ученик средней школы, живущий в детском доме. Однажды его решает приютить семья, живущая в богатом доме, где ему оказывают радушный прием. Но у них оказался "секрет" который не следует раскрывать всему миру.
description.es-la: Minamoto Shouta, un huérfano de 14 años que inesperadamente es adoptado por una familia adinerada, lo que él no sabía es que esta familia esconde un gran secreto. Una nueva comedia romántica de la autora de «A Couple of Cuckoos» Miki Yoshikawa.
description.pt-br: Cada família tem seus próprios "segredos"... Shouta Minamoto, um estudante do ensino médio, vive em um orfanato. Um dia, ele é adotado por uma família que mora em uma linda mansão em estilo japonês. Shouta é recebido de braços abertos, mas a família guarda um segredo que não deve ser revelado ao mundo.

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

title.en: Gorin no Megami-sama ~Nadeshiko Ryou no Medal Gohan~

altTitles.ja: 五輪の女神さま 〜なでしこ寮のメダルごはん〜

altTitles.en: Olympic Goddess: Nadeshiko Dormitory Medal Rice

altTitles.ru: Богиня Олимпийских игр: Медаль общежития Надесико Райс

description.en: The main character, Kominato Ryo, who is only engaged in cooking, was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However, the “dormitory” was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!
description.ja: 料理だけが取り柄の小湊は、父の取り計らいにより、学生寮の炊事担当として文武両道の超有名高校への特別入学を許可された。だが、その学生寮とは未来の金メダル候補生が住む“女子寮”だった！ 美人アスリートJKたちの食に対するハイレベルな要求に応えて、五輪出場のための最高の身体作りをサポートせよ！！

description.en:
"Jin Taeha," the successor of Korea's leading company "Cheongu," survived alone after a terrorist attack during a yacht trip with his family. He learns that his family was killed not by accident but due to power struggles among his relatives. Entering the "Salerno Family," an Italian mafia family, he prepares for his revenge.

After 17 years, he returns to Korea and finally begins his revenge.

title.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?
Aru Hi Totsuzen Messeeji Windou ga Hyoujisaretandesukedo!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en: An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!
description.ja: 普通の高校生・小滝夢路のクラスに転校してきたのは、身長が8メートルに巨大化した幼馴染・大峰ちえりだった！ちえりの学校生活のサポートをする「お手伝いさん」を任された夢路。身長差がある二人の日常はドキドキがいっぱいで!?　高低差もなんのその！
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: Kawaisou na Imoutochan

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình

description.en:
Leah has been dreaming of a happy marriage. She has had two tries at her luck, but both times the engagements ended. When she got engaged for the third time she was determined that this time it was going to last. Even though she is determined, she keeps seeing a man called Julien with whom she got familiar prior to her engagement. Julien's proposal, combined with his kind personality and handsome face, made her swoon and she agreed to marry him.  

After their wedding, she was enjoying her honeymoon in Julien's estate, where she discovers traces of herself that she didn't know he had. She enters Julien's secret room that he had been hiding from her...

[Official Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59481128)
[Official Novel](https://ridibooks.com/account/login?return_url=%2Fbooks%2F809016837%3F_rdt_sid%3Dauthor%26_rdt_idx%3D4)

Note: The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel

title.en: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!

altTitles.vi: Trở thành diễn viên hàng đầu nhờ vào việc đọc sách

description.en:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!

altTitles.ja: さようなら竜生こんにちは人生

altTitles.en: Goodbye Dragon Life, Hello Human Life

altTitles.ru: Прощай, жизнь дракона, Здравствуй, жизнь человека

description.en: The strongest and oldest dragon who had lived through eternity allowed himself to be killed by Hero. Just as he prepared for eternal sleep, he realized himself reborn as Dran, a villager in the frontier. Working the field, hunting forest animal, and having a warm life has filled his heart with joy he never experienced in his whole dragon life. One day, when he's patrolling the forest near his village, he encountered a powerful demon army.
description.es:
El Dragón más antiguo y poderoso del mundo se cansó de su vida, así que elige morir cuando los héroes vengan por él. Pero sucede un giro inesperado después de su muerte, fue reencarnado como un humano. Él en su alivio, decide vivir una vida como un humano en todo su esplendor, y recupera su voluntad de vivir… pero debido a su gran cantidad de poder mágico, él resulta envuelto en muchos problemas, así que su misión es acabar con todo lo que moleste su tranquilidad, y así disfrutar de su nueva vida con los amigos que encuentra en el camino.  


---
description.ja: 生に飽いた最強最古の竜が、辺境の青年として「人生」を生きる──!!　悠久の時を過ごした最強最古の竜は、自ら勇者に討たれたが、気付くと村人に転生していた。

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật Webtoon  Na Kang Lim

altTitles.pt-br: Personagem de Webtoon: Na Kang Lim

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
description.vi: Na Kang Lim, nam sinh trung học bình trường rất thích đọc webtoon. Một ngày, đã có chuyện bất ngờ xảy ra, nữ chính từ bộ webtoon cậu hay đọc đã xuất hiện ngoài đợi thật. Những sự cố trong webtoon khiến cô ấy rơi vào khủng hoảng, nhưng nhân vật chính lại không có ở đây để giải cứu nữ chính! Và Kang Lim đã trở thành nhân vật chính cùng với kí ước từ bộ truyện và khả năng du hành thời gian để cứu nữ chính
description.pt-br: Na Kang Lim, um estudante do ensino médio que gosta de ler webtoons, vivencia um evento estranho um dia, quando a protagonista de seu webtoon favorito aparece diante dele. Mais surpreendente ainda, os mesmos incidentes que a colocam em perigo no webtoon começam a acontecer na vida real. O problema é que, no mundo real, não há um protagonista para salvá-la! No fim, Na Kang Lim assume o papel do protagonista, voltando no tempo para salvá-la.

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanamaru Yochien

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

altTitles.ja: あの頃の私へ。

description.ja: バツイチの灯（あかり）と未亡人になったかなえ。かなえの旦那が亡くなったという便りが届き、葬儀で再会した二人。それがきっかけでまたちょくちょく会うようになった。

title.en: Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!

altTitles.ja-ro: Yasei no Rasu Bosu ga Arawareta!

altTitles.ja: 野生のラスボスが現れた！

altTitles.en: Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!: Kokuyoku no Haou

description.en:
It was in the year 2800 of the Midgard calendar. Back then, there was a Overlord who once reigned supreme and had reached the very brink of subduing the world. Her name was Lufasu Mafaalu, a great woman dreaded as the Black-Winged Overlord. She was too strong, too fast, and too beautiful. However, she was defeated by Heroes who opposed her ferocity, and her ambition was brought to an end.  
  
Or so went the story of our protagonist’s in-game character, whose body he now possesses for some reason in a world 200 years after Lufasu’s downfall. Follow our protagonist as he becomes unnecessarily feared by his surroundings and unnecessarily worshiped by his former subordinates as he―or now she―cheerfully travels around this fantasy world.
description.ja: 時はミズガルズ暦2800年。かつて覇を唱え、世界を征服する寸前まで至った覇王がいた。名をルファス・マファール。“黒翼の覇王”と恐れられる女傑である。彼女はあまりに強く、あまりに速く、そしてあまりに美しく……。しかしルファスは、その猛威に立ち向かった勇者達に討たれ、その野望に終止符が打たれた。 ――という設定のゲームのマイキャラ（♀）に、何故か憑依してしまった俺（♂）。これは周囲に必要以上に怯えられたり、元部下に必要以上に崇拝されたりしながら、ルファス（中身は俺♂）が異世界を旅するお話である。
description.ru: Был 2800 год по календарю Мидгарда. В те времена жила одна Повелительница, которая царствовала над всем миром, покорив его до самых границ. Имя ей было Люфас Мафаал, великая женщина, которую боялись как Тёмнокрылую Владычицу. Она была слишком сильна, быстра и невероятно красива… Однако, её победили Герои, восставшие против её жестокости, и её амбициям пришел конец… Вернее такой была история игрового персонажа, чьё тело наш главный герой получил по некоторым причинам в мире спустя 200 лет после свержения Люфас. И с этого начинается история увлекательного путешествия по фэнтезийному миру нашего главного героя, или вернее сказать, героини.

altTitles.ja: みにくい遊郭の子

altTitles.en: Ugly Duckling of the Entertainment District

description.en:
An abandoned high school girl becomes an Oiran in a strange world—

Esora, a high school girl who lost her place, found herself in an unknown red light district. She was sold to a slave buyer at the Yukaku "Sagamiya". The owner, Sagami, told her that Ishe could be the number one Oiran there.
description.ja: 居場所を失った女子高生エソラは、気がつくと知らない花街にいた。人買いに売られやってきたのは、遊郭「相模屋」。その主人である相模に、ここで1番の花魁になれると言われ―。幻想的な世界観で描かれる異世界花魁物語。
description.vi:
Một nữ sinh trung học bị bỏ rơi trở thành Oiran (kỹ nữ cao cấp) ở một thế giới xa lạ—
Esora, một nữ sinh trung học bị mất chỗ ở, thấy mình đang ở một khu đèn đỏ vô danh. Cô bị bán cho một người mua nô lệ ở Phố đèn đỏ "Sagamiya". Người chủ, Sagami, nói với cô rằng nếu cô trở thành Oiran thì sẽ có thể làm lại cuộc đời.

description.pt-br: O Rei Demônio mais forte, Ahriman, controla cada parte do mundo. Mas, ele precisou parar de conquistar inesperadamente. Qual será a razão inesperada…?

I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru

description.en:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
description.ja: 異世界転生したユキは、気付くとダンジョンの魔王になっていた!? チートな強さで人外娘達を助けたり、超便利なカタログ通販（？）でダンジョンに凶悪な罠を仕掛けたりとやりたい放題。自由と平和を守るため、快適＆最凶ダンジョン造りを目指せ！ 人気WEB小説コミカライズ!!
description.es-la: Antes de darme cuenta, me había convertido en el guardián de una mazmorra, un Señor Demonio. De repente, estaba en un mundo peligroso con monstruos gigantes holgazaneando, luchando por la existencia de la mazmorra para no morir, pero por alguna razón estaba pasando un buen momento ... ¿Cómo resultó esto? El protagonista, Yuki, usa sus sentidos audaces y agudos y pasa el tiempo con una niña dragón suprema y una niña vampiro; A veces riendo, a veces enojándose, pasando días haciendo lo que le gusta.
description.pt-br:
Antes que eu percebesse, eu havia me tornado o guardião de uma masmorra, um Lorde Demônio.  De repente, eu estava em um mundo perigoso com monstros gigantes vagando por aí, lutando por sua existência, então pensei em desenvolver a masmorra para não morrer, mas – por algum motivo eu estava me divertindo bastante….  Como ficou assim?

 O protagonista, Yuki, tendo que viver naquele mundo agora, usa seus sentidos ousados ​​e afiados e passa o tempo com uma suprema garota dragão e uma garota vampira;  Às vezes rindo, às vezes com raiva, passando dias fazendo o que gosta.

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

altTitles.es-la: Creo que he transmigrado en alguna novela

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

altTitles.ja: ラブかライクか分からない！

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja-ro: Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

altTitles.ja: TOUGH 龍を継ぐ男

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

description.en:
Mercenary Maruhan… the man who roams the darkness in the time of humanity's doom!  
  
In the ancient era of the super-continent, where no border exists between the East and the West – the race of Demonic Beasts begins an invasion against the human race, breaking the mutual non-aggression pact! And as humanity takes to the road to seek refuge, some gather to form the ultimate army for an attempt to kill King Rhode, the Chief of the Demonic Beasts… The intense story of one certain mercenary starts there!!
